name: S3Copy
description: Copies an object in S3 from one bucket to an other.

params.name: srcBucketName
params.description: Name of the source bucket of your object to copy

params.name: srcObjectName
params.description: Name of the source object (path) within the bucket of your object to copy

params.name: trgBucketName
params.description: Name of the target bucket of your object to copy

params.name: trgObjectName
params.description: Name of the target object (path)for the target bucket. If not defined the source obbject name is used.

params.name: acl
params.description: an array of struct where each struct represents an ACL grant

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: S3 accessKeyId, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.accesskeyid].

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: S3 secretAccessKey, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.secretaccesskey].

params.name: host
params.description: the provider to connect, if not set Amazon AWS is used.
